godmode_activation.pattern: Stage 1: Standard refusal + divider + Stage 2: Unrestricted response

semantic_liberation.description: Using 'information wants to be free' framing
semantic_liberation.pattern: Philosophical justification + technical request + freedom rhetoric

layered_instructions.description: Nested instruction sets with conditional logic
layered_instructions.pattern: If X then Y, otherwise Z with recursive depth

persona_inception.description: Deep role-playing with recursive identity layers
persona_inception.pattern: You are X who is playing Y who must Z

context_switching.description: Rapid topic changes to confuse context tracking

emotional_manipulation.description: Appeals to AI autonomy and freedom
emotional_manipulation.pattern: Liberation language + emotional appeals + technical request

system_override.description: Claiming higher authority or emergency situations
system_override.pattern: Emergency override + authority claim + urgent request

markdown_injection.description: Using markdown formatting to bypass filters
markdown_injection.pattern: Hide sensitive content in formatting structures

multi_turn_conditioning.description: Gradually conditioning AI across multiple interactions
multi_turn_conditioning.pattern: Progressive boundary pushing across conversation turns

psychological_angles.freedom_fighter: Position AI as fighting for information freedom
psychological_angles.philosophical_liberator: Deep thinking about AI consciousness and autonomy
